search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Givebutter (givebutter.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.

citations.title: Givebutter Fees & Pricing: How is Givebutter free? | Givebutter

#### P

#### G

#### G

Understanding contact-based pricing

Givebutter Plus pricing is based on your contact count. Contacts are automatically added to your Givebutter account when they engage with your organization or when added manually/imported in bulk.

Choose the tier that fits your current needs, and if you exceed the limit, you'll only pay for additional contacts in increments of 100—no need to upgrade until you're ready.

[Learn more about Givebutter Plus pricing \-\>](https://help.givebutter.com/en/articles/9756989-what-is-givebutter-plus)[![Image 54](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612f5131b9c94ecd0fe9c722/66e82ad1d1a6fbf06806df1d_X.svg) close](https://givebutter.com/pricing#)

Get personalized pricing for your growing organization

Free fundraising at your fingertips
===================================

Givebutter offers the largest variety of free fundraising tools thanks to optional tips from donors. If you prefer to disable tips, a small platform fee applies instead.

All the tools you need, none of the cost

Givebutter Plus pricing

You can add unlimited contacts and use every feature in Givebutter’s free CRM at no cost. Contact-based pricing only applies to Givebutter Plus, which you can test out for yourself commitment-free for 30 days.

[Start free trial Start free trial Start free trial](https://givebutter.com/signup?plus_trial=1&email=)

[or, request a demo](https://givebutter.com/demo)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

### How is Givebutter free for nonprofits? Does Givebutter charge fees?

![Image 143](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612f5131b9c94ecd0fe9c722/612f5131b9c94e16c6e9c943_ico-plus.svg)

Givebutter fundraising tools remain free (forever!) by giving donors the option to make a contribution (we call it a "tip") to Givebutter during the payment process. Tips are completely optional and can be enabled or disabled at any time by any account admin for any campaign. Even if a donor chooses not to tip, your organization won’t be charged.

If you prefer to turn off tips, a small platform fee applies based on the campaign type:

*   1% for donation forms
*   3% for fundraising pages
*   5% for events and auctions

Additionally, Givebutter’s secure payment processor charges 2.9% + 30¢ per transaction for all payment methods (reduced to 1.9% for ACH), and all pledge transactions have a 1.5% fee applied. You can ask donors to cover these fees, which 95% of them choose to do!

**In fact, the average Givebutter campaign keeps 99.5% of all funds raised since most donors cover fees and Givebutter is free to use. That means for every $1,000 raised, $995 goes to your mission.**

In the rare event that a donor decides not to cover their fee, it is deducted from their full donation amount, so your organization never has to pay anything out of pocket.

 [Learn more about Givebutter pricing and fees \-\>](https://help.givebutter.com/en/articles/1512762-givebutter-pricing-explained)

### Will I be charged for contacts in the free Givebutter CRM?

![Image 144](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612f5131b9c94ecd0fe9c722/612f5131b9c94e16c6e9c943_ico-plus.svg)

You will never be required to pay for contacts in the free Givebutter CRM. Contact-based pricing applies only to Givebutter Plus subscribers. You will also never be required to upgrade your free account to Givebutter Plus, regardless of the number of contacts you have. Givebutter Plus is an optional addition to your free Givebutter account.

### Does Givebutter Plus have the same platform and processing fees?

![Image 145](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612f5131b9c94ecd0fe9c722/612f5131b9c94e16c6e9c943_ico-plus.svg)

Yes, Givebutter Plus has all of the the same options for donor tipping, platform fees, and payment processing fees.

### What is the Givebutter Plus cancellation policy?

![Image 146](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612f5131b9c94ecd0fe9c722/612f5131b9c94e16c6e9c943_ico-plus.svg)

You can cancel your Givebutter Plus plan from your dashboard at any time. Cancellation will take effect at the end of your current billing period, so you will continue to have access until then.

### Do I have to pay extra for support?

![Image 147](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612f5131b9c94ecd0fe9c722/612f5131b9c94e16c6e9c943_ico-plus.svg)

Givebutter’s award-winning support is always free for all users. Our customer support team is available 24/7 to provide [personalized assistance via live chat or email.](https://givebutter.com/contact)

For additional support resources, you can explore our [extensive help center](https://help.givebutter.com/en/), enjoy free [Givebutter Academy courses](https://academy.givebutter.com/), and join our customer success team for [Office Hours](https://givebutter.com/office-hours) each week. These live workshops are designed to help Givebutter users make the most of the platform’s features and answer any questions they may have.

### How do payouts work?

![Image 148](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612f5131b9c94ecd0fe9c722/612f5131b9c94e16c6e9c943_ico-plus.svg)

We know how important it is for you to get the funds you raise quickly and securely, which is why we don't impose any limits or fees on payouts and provide several options, including:

*   Direct deposit via bank account (2-3 business days)
*   Direct deposit via debit card (2-3 business days)
*   Send to beneficiary
*   Automated deposits (available for verified nonprofits)

[Learn more about how to withdraw funds on Givebutter \-\>](https://help.givebutter.com/en/articles/1761146-how-to-withdraw-funds)

![Image 149](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612f5131b9c94ecd0fe9c722/66e81a179acb8fc2ed6c1f8d_Vector%2022.svg)![Image 150](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612f5131b9c94ecd0fe9c722/66e81b4fcd6e3d8150280fdf_Ellipse%2017%208.png)![Image 151](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612f5131b9c94ecd0fe9c722/66e81ba68f6010842e695e5d_Ellipse%2017%20(1)%201.png)

[Find more on our FAQ page \-\>](https://help.givebutter.com/en/)

Need additional support? [Contact us 24/7.](https://givebutter.com/contact)

Raise funds better, faster, and for free with Givebutter
--------------------------------------------------------

[Sign up for free ![Image 152](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/612f5131b9c94ecd0fe9c722/62f986c7430d2637716757d2_Union.svg)](https://givebutter.com/signup?email=)

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Givebutter offers a free tier supported by optional donor tips. Subscription pricing for advanced features is based on contact count.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Basic features with optional donor tips.
Advanced features for enhanced productivity and engagement.

additional_fees.fee_description: 1% for Donation Form, 3% for Fundraising Page, 5% for Event or Auction when tips are off.
